trans-unit.source: Represents a filter that allows only certain Unicode code points.
trans-unit.target: 表示只允許特定 Unicode 字碼指標的篩選。

trans-unit.source: The source code for this type is available in the [System.Text.Encodings.Web project](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Text.Encodings.Web) on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 此類型的原始程式碼位於[System.Text.Encodings.Web 專案](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Text.Encodings.Web)GitHub 上。

trans-unit.source: Unit tests that can also serve as code examples are found in the [System.Text.Encodings.Web/tests](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Text.Encodings.Web/tests) folder on GitHub.
trans-unit.target: 單元測試，也可以做為程式碼範例中找到[System.Text.Encodings.Web/tests](https://github.com/dotnet/corefx/tree/master/src/System.Text.Encodings.Web/tests) GitHub 上的資料夾。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates an empty filter (allows no code points through by default).
trans-unit.target: 具現化空白篩選 (預設不允許任何字碼指標通過)。

trans-unit.source: The other <see cref="T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings" /> object to be cloned.
trans-unit.target: 要複製的其他 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a filter by cloning the allowed list of another <see cref="T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 藉由複製另一個 <see cref="T:System.Text.Encodings.Web.TextEncoderSettings" /> 物件的允許清單來具現化篩選。

trans-unit.source: The allowed character ranges.
trans-unit.target: 允許的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a filter where only the character ranges specified by <paramref name="allowedRanges" /> are allowed by the filter.
trans-unit.target: 具現化篩選，它僅具有篩選所允許之 <paramref name="allowedRanges" /> 所指定的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedRanges" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedRanges" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The allowed character.
trans-unit.target: 允許的字元。

trans-unit.source: Allows the character specified by <paramref name="character" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選允許 <paramref name="character" /> 指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: The allowed characters.
trans-unit.target: 允許的字元。

trans-unit.source: Allows all characters specified by <paramref name="characters" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選允許 <paramref name="characters" /> 指定的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="characters" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="characters" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The allowed code points.
trans-unit.target: 允許的字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: Allows all code points specified by <paramref name="codePoints" />.
trans-unit.target: 允許 <paramref name="codePoints" /> 指定的所有字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="codePoints" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="codePoints" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The range of characters to be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 要允許的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: Allows all characters specified by <paramref name="range" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選允許 <paramref name="range" /> 指定的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="range" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="range" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The ranges of characters to be allowed.
trans-unit.target: 要允許的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: Allows all characters specified by <paramref name="ranges" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選允許 <paramref name="ranges" /> 指定的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ranges" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ranges" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Resets this object by disallowing all characters.
trans-unit.target: 藉由不允許所有字元，重設此物件。

trans-unit.source: The disallowed character.
trans-unit.target: 不允許的字元。

trans-unit.source: Disallows the character <paramref name="character" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選不允許字元 <paramref name="character" />。

trans-unit.source: The disallowed characters.
trans-unit.target: 不允許的字元。

trans-unit.source: Disallows all characters specified by <paramref name="characters" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選不允許 <paramref name="characters" /> 指定的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="characters" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="characters" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The range of characters to be disallowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: Disallows all characters specified by <paramref name="range" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選不允許 <paramref name="range" /> 指定的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="range" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="range" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The ranges of characters to be disallowed.
trans-unit.target: 不允許的字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: Disallows all characters specified by <paramref name="ranges" /> through the filter.
trans-unit.target: 透過篩選不允許 <paramref name="ranges" /> 指定的所有字元。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ranges" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ranges" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator of all allowed code points.
trans-unit.target: 取得所有允許字碼指標的列舉程式。

trans-unit.source: The enumerator of allowed code points.
trans-unit.target: 所有允許字碼指標的列舉程式。
